clinical_study.brief_title: Safety Study of a Chinese Herbal Formula Simotang Oral Liquid for the Treatment of Functional Dyspepsia
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 2 Study of of a Chinese Herbal Formula Simotang Oral Liquid for the Treatment of Functional Dyspepsia

lead_sponsor.agency: Hunan University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

clinical_study.source: Hunan University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: Functional dyspepsia (FD) is a common functional gastrointestinal disorder and is steadily becoming a public health problem.Simotang is a classical formula that has been used to treat gastrointestinal disorders for hundreds of years [9] and was approved as an oral liquid drug by the Chinese National Food and Drug Administration in the 1980s.In this study,patients with functional dyspepsia were divided according to the inclusive criteria into treatment group and control group randomly, who were given Simo decoction or Domperidone tablets for 14 daysã€‚And then the gastric emptying, Symptoms in plasma were observed before and after treatment in mult-center.

primary_outcome.measure: Improvement of gastrointestinal Symptom as efficacy and the Number of Participants with Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety

secondary_outcome.measure: Chinese version of the Nepean Dyspepsia Index as a Measure of efficacy

clinical_study.condition: Effect of Simotang on FD Was Studied

study_pop.textblock: patients with functional dyspepsia primary care clinic were studied

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients met the definition of the Rome III criteria for FD
